data.title: Sherman Hemsley Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Sherman Hemsley on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Sherman Hemsley including Mr. Nanny, Screwed, and more.
data.text:
Here Comes the Judge

Philip's campaign for superior court judge begins with an embarrassing scandal when Will is arrested for $2,000 worth of unpaid parking tickets.

Asses to Ashes

Senile and incompetent Judge Carl Robertson resorts to slander to defeat Philip in the election for California State Superior Court Judge, but when Robertson dies during his victory party, Philip is chosen to give the eulogy.

I, Done, Pt. 2

In the poignant series finale, the Banks family prepares to move away from California, and Will confronts his lack of achievements since he moved in with them. SHERMAN HEMSLEY, ISABEL SANFORD and MARLA GIBBS guest star, along with GARY COLEMAN and CONRAD BAIN.
